task.title: Add users to the user registry

titlealts.searchtitle: Add users to the user registry

task.shortdesc: Add the administrative users and the database user must be manually added to the user registry.

context.p: As detailed in , the configured user registry is used for authentication of administrative users and the database user. The WebSphere administrative users and the database user must be manually added to the user registry as follows.

step.cmd: Navigate to Users and GroupsManage Users.
Fill in the details for the administrative user and select Create.
Repeat the steps for the database user.

result.p: If administrative security was enabled when creating the profile the administrative user may already be defined in the registry.
